changeSet.author: jmuzinda
changeSet.comment: Update all components with a parent and the parent having a batch while child location is null to parent location
changeSet.sql: UPDATE Component a RIGHT JOIN Component b ON a.parentComponent_id = b.id SET a.location_id = b.location_id WHERE (a.parentComponent_id = b.id) AND b.componentBatch_id IS NOT NULL AND a.parentComponent_id IS NOT NULL;
